extendedInfo.description: In His Steps is the daily Scripture reflection journal of Couples for Christ â Global Mission Foundation, Inc. It aims to faithfully guide its readers in developing a deeper relationship with God and, as a result thereof, fostering a transforming love for others. Found in its pages are the personal insights and experiences of members of CFC and its different ministries, mainly Handmaids of the Lord, Singles for Christ, and Youth for Christ. Members of the clergy who are familiar with the work of CFC have also contributed reflections to this volume.FEATURES:- Daily Scripture reading from July 1 - September 30, 2013- Daily reflections and guide questions for personal reflection- Current reading will be shown based on the current date- Calendar feature to jump to a specific day- Supports all device sizes (using text size settings)- NEW!!! Ability to add and save your own sharing/reflection for each day!PLUS ADDITIONAL FEATURES:- New English Roman Missal- Essential Catholic Prayers- Novenas- Monthly Prayer Intentions- Bible in 1 year

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Use this on my tablet. Makes Household and any gathering easier because I am sure to always have my In his steps with me.   Recommendations : please also include the Intercessory Prayers on yhe features.   Also am waiting for an app for the Glory Songbook.   God bless us all...
reviews.author: Romeo Sale
